alert.note: Alert for Jefferson Davis (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 23 at 11:35AM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Jefferson Davis Parish through NOON CDT... At 1135 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Pine Island, or 8 miles southwest of Elton, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Welsh, Fenton, Pine Island, Lacassine and Hathaway. This includes Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 47 and 54. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
